statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.5}+{6.67}\right)}={22.34}\approx{22.34}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.67}\cdot{3.86}={25.7462}\approx{25.7}.
